# Change Log

**目前还是预览版**

All notable changes to the "numpy-pilot" extension will be documented in this file.

Check [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/) for recommendations on how to structure this file.

## [Unreleased]

### Changed
- 确认合适的侧边栏函数描述

### Added
- 增加NumPy常用模板，例如拟合函数、迭代法等


## [0.0.2]

### Changed
- 校正代码片段


## [0.0.1]

- Initial release
